Parse METAR Message

parse_metar_wx.Rd

Parse a METAR current weather section

parse_metar_wx(x)

Arguments

x

METAR reports (character vector)

Author

M. Saenger, Zimmerberg Risk Analytics GmbH

Examples

x <- parse_metar(metar.test$code)$wx

#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
parse_metar_wx(x)
